alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 27 at 2:27PM EST until November 29 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT EST TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Highly-variable snowfall totals expected to range from 2 to 5 inches in far-southwestern Cuyahoga County to 10 to 15 inches in far-northeastern Cuyahoga County. * WHERE...Cuyahoga County. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to midnight EST Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult or impossible at times. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to push south into the area late tonight into Tuesday morning with snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour in the heaviest snow bands.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
